title: Welcome To ENIES LOBBY! | ONE PIECE REACTION + REVIEW - Episode 264 & 265
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction and review video covering the beginning of the Enies Lobby assault in episodes 264 and 265, focusing on Luffy's solo charge and the arrival of the allied forces.

title: WE MADE IT TO ENIES LOBBY!! One Piece Episode 264 & 265 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Various Reactors
description: Enthusiastic reaction video to the start of the Enies Lobby assault, highlighting Luffy's determination and the introduction of the giant gatekeepers.

title: TWO NEW DEVIL FRUITS? | One Piece Episode 265-266 REACTION
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction video covering episodes 265-266, focusing on the giant battle and progression through Enies Lobby's gates.

title: ATTACK ON ENNIES LOBBY! | One Piece Episode 265 & 266 REACTION
author: Various Reactors
description: Anime reaction video covering the assault on Enies Lobby, featuring the battles at the main gate and the debut of Kashii and Oimo.

title: LUFFY SOLOS ENIES LOBBY! | One Piece Episode 265 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Couples Reactors
description: Couples reaction and discussion focusing on Luffy's impressive solo assault on Enies Lobby in episode 265.

title: 265: Luffy Cuts Through! Big Showdown on the Judicial Island!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Detailed blog review of episode 265, praising the lighter action tone after recent dramatic episodes. The reviewer appreciated Luffy's creative tactics and noted Spandam's strategic thinking.

title: One Piece: Who are Oimo and Kashii, the Giants from Enies Lobby?
author: ComingSoon Editorial
description: Character guide article explaining the backstory of Oimo and Kashii, their connection to the Giant Warrior Pirates, and how they were deceived by the World Government.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains character information and spoilers through episode 267

title: One Piece: Who are Oimo and Kashii, the Giants from Enies Lobby?
author: Yahoo Entertainment
description: Entertainment article providing background on the giant characters Oimo and Kashii, their role in the Enies Lobby arc, and their eventual defection.
